name: SNOW SHOCK
description:
This game is a submission for the Black and White Jam #⁷√∞

You are a spy on a mission- to clear out this snowy mountain base of it's many soldiers and snipers.

Believe it or not, the entire game renders just in black and white. Thanks to a ridiculous amount of dithering it may seem to you that there are more colors, but there are only two.

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, space+WASD to dive in directions, E to pick up items, Q to drop held item. To regenerate health you need to find and pick up Medkits.

The suppressed pistol doesn't do much damage but it also doesn't attract much attention. On the other hand the Uzi is a noisemaker through and through. The sniper rifle does a ridiculous amount of damage, at the cost of fire-rate, and a very loud shot.

There is actually an AI system in the game, so if you're stealthy enough you should be able to dish out tons of damage without taking many hits yourself. 

Update, version 2:

  • Fixed navmeshing bugs
  • Improved the map
  • Significantly improved AI behaviors
  • Bugfixes
